name: KæmpeNisse
description:
(use M to mute the music)

It's hard to be a nisseman! 

Nobody wants to put out any porridge anymore, and so nisser have to fight each other to eat.


This game is an entry in the week long LibGDX jam #23.  A collaboration between Sandra Moen and Daniele Conti.

(If the game screen does not fit the screen press the full screen button at the lower right corner)

Undisputed evidence that it is indeed hard to be a nisseman!
